Uses of Interface
com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings.CheckSettingsBuilder

  • Packages that use CheckSettingsBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings  
    com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.factory  
    com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.checkSettings  

    • Uses of CheckSettingsBuilder in com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings

      Methods in com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings that return CheckSettingsBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withGrammarChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables grammar checking.
      Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isGrammarCheckingAvailable() must be true.
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withLanguage(Language lang)
      Sets the checking Language.
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withReportLanguage(Language language)
      Sets the report language.
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withReuseChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables Reuse checking.
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withRuleSet(RuleSet ruleSet)
      Sets the checking RuleSet
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withSEOChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables search engine optimization checking.
      Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isSEOCheckingAvailable() must be true. You also have to define keywords using DocumentCheckSettingsBuilder.withKeywords(List).
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withSpellChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables spelling checking.
      Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isSpellCheckingAvailable() must be true.
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withStyleChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables style checking.
      Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isStyleCheckingAvailable() must be true.
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withTermChecking(Set<TermStatus> termStatus, Set<TermSet> termSets)
      Enables term checking.
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilder.withTermHarvesting(boolean enabled)
      Enables term harvesting.

    • Uses of CheckSettingsBuilder in com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.factory

      Methods in com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.factory that return CheckSettingsBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilderFactory.copy(CheckSettings checkSettings)
      Copies CheckSettings.
      CheckSettingsBuilder CheckSettingsBuilderFactory.create(Language lang, RuleSet ruleSet)
      Creates a new CheckSettingsBuilder.
